channel.title: vim on Huy Le
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Huy Le

item.title: Initial Configs
item.description: Initial vim configurations. Played around and finally settled on Rafi’s vim-config on GitHub. It had configurations for NeoVim as well as vim, and it had all the little things I was looking for when setting up Vim initially. Checkout his configurations - https://github.com/rafi/vim-config What is Dein? and Denite? Dein is a Vim package mananger. How does it work? Reading log messages :messages will show the messages What is Deoplete Completion!

item.title: Vim Essentials
item.description: There are so many things to talk about Vim, this article is aimed to help you get you familiar with Vim by learning what the basic features and ability of Vim. After using Vim for about a year now, there are a few things I wish I knew about Vim when I first made the commitment to jump over to this ancient looking editor; let me tell you, this text editor is anything be ancient.
